entry.title: Re These kind of loans obviously come with significant risks. Revenues of DAO's are highly volatile & can dry up completely. To mitigate risks somewha...
entry.summary: Re These kind of loans obviously come with significant risks. Revenues of DAO's are highly volatile & can dry up completely. To mitigate risks somewhat, the bonds are over-collateralized in governance tokens (in this case 250% LTV in $FOX).

entry.summary: If you did some trades on @blur_io or swept some floors you are eligible to claim some care packages now. In order to claim your care packages you just need to submit one bid on any collection listed on Blur. In January you will be able to claim $BLUR from your care packages. Blur: Blur Airdrop 2 is officially LIVE! Our second airdrop is 10x larger than the first. You have 14 days to claim by placing a bid on Blur ⏰
